metadata.title: CVE-2022-4104 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A loop with an unreachable exit condition can be triggered by passing acrafted JPEG file to the Lepton image compression tool, resulting in adenial-of-service.

criterions.comment: lepton: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
